Body.Content:
We are announcing the Generate flow description using AI feature for Power Automate. This feature adds a button that will automatically generate a flow description without users having to open the flow and read the actions inside it. This feature will reach general availability on March 31, 2025.

How does this affect me?
Users will be able to access this feature in Power Automate desktop by performing the following steps:
  1. Navigate to the 'My flows' tab, then select a flow.
  2. Access the flow's properties, then select the 'general flows properties' tab.
  3. Click the 'Let Copilot create description' button and Copilot will analyze the flow and generate a description.
Users will be able to access this feature in the Power Automate portal by performing the following steps:
  1. Locate the appropriate flow, then select 'details' from the flow menu.
  2. From there, select 'Edit', then click the 'Let Copilot create description' button and Copilot will analyze the flow and generate a description.
What do I need to do to prepare?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

If you would like more information on this feature, please visit Generate flow description using AI.

Title: Power Automate - Generate flow description using AI
